a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total net enrollment rate in primary education by sex, 2015
The total net enrollment rate is the total number of students of the official age group for primary education who are
enrolled in any level of education divided by the total population in that age group.
Total net enrolment rate, primary, female (%)
Total net enrolment rate, primary, male (%)
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics
